refnamediv.refpurpose: Changes the name of old_name to new_name.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Changes the name of old_name to new_name. Note that this does not change any references to old_name that may appear in other combinations in the database. The mvall command will change an objectÂ’s name everywhere.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the mv command to change an object's old_name to a new_name.

example.title: Change an object's name.
example.para: Changes the name of shapea to shapeb.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
